card_text: This card gains these effects, based on the number of different Attributes the "Yang Zing" monsters in your GY have.$N●2+: "Yang Zing" monsters you control gain 500 ATK.$N●3+: If a "Yang Zing" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can send this card to the GY instead.$N●4+: Your opponent cannot Set monsters. Change all face-up monsters your opponent controls to Attack Position.$N●5+: You can send this card to the GY; destroy all cards on the field.
